data.title: Oregon Department of Transportation : Region Contacts : Regions : State of Oregon
data.meta_description: ODOT Region Contacts list is developed to help our customers find business locations, names and phone numbers of key staff members.
data.text:
â€‹There are 14 maintenance districts across the state. Each district is responsible for the day-to-day maintenance and operations of the state highways in their geographic area. To ask a question or report a concern on a specific section of highway, please contact the local district office.

Visit this web page to view a complete list of district offices and phone numbers.
